alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 7:29PM CST until November 20 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Simpson County in central Mississippi... Southern Smith County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Northern Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 830 PM CST. * At 729 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pinola, or 8 miles south of Mendenhall, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Magee and Sanatorium around 735 PM CST. Mount Olive around 740 PM CST. Mize around 745 PM CST. Center Ridge around 755 PM CST. Taylorsville around 800 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central, south central and southeastern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Simpson; Smith
